author: DougInNC
content:
Thanks for sharing this background. It was timely for me, after listening to a song by a friend (link below) that references “Hamilton’s Light” in telling a story where the schooner Patriot was lost off Cape Hatteras on January 1, 1813. I did not know that the original Light there has been called Hamilton’s Light.”
